attributes.action: I do not agree with the settlement Mrs May has reached with the EU
attributes.background: The country did not have a vote to partially leave the EU the referendum was to leave clear and simple, not to leave and keep little bits

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you'd like there to be a public vote on the final deal for the UK leaving the EU, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200004
